import { LockClosedIcon } from '@heroicons/react/20/solid'; import { useState } from 'react'; import { } from '' export default function Signup() { const [userDetails, setUserDetails] = useState({ username: "", email: "", password: "", }) const navigate = useNavigate(); // const notifyWarn = () => toast.warning("User already exist or something went wrong", { position: toast.POSITION.TOP_CENTER }); const registerUser = (e) => { // Cannot send empty data if (userDetails.username === "" || userDetails.email === "" || userDetails.password === "") { alert("To register user, fill details please!") } else { fetch("http://localhost:4000/api/signup", { method: "POST", headers: { 'Content-type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify(userDetails) }).then((result) => { alert("Successfully Signup") navigate('/login'); }) .catch((error) => { // notifyWarn(); console.log("Something went wrong ", error); }) } } return ( <>

{ setUserDetails({ ...userDetails, username: e.target.value }) }} />
